context.p: To build from source, be sure that the data warehouse machine as the following:
Also, make sure there is an installed copy of Eucalyptus from the testing branch (the DW needs jar files located in /usr/share/eucalyptus).
context.note: Do not install the data warehouse on a machine running Eucalyptus.

info.codeblock: nt -Ddistro.name=centos mkdir -p /usr/share/java/eucadw cp -a lib/*.jar /usr/share/java/eucadw cp -a dist/*.jar /usr/share/java/eucadw
cd eucadw python setup.py build python setup.py install
